title: Hot to programm a webserver usering Express
author: Hans Müller
description: A practical guide to building powerful web servers using Express.js, covering routing, middleware, REST APIs, and deployment — ideal for beginners and aspiring full-stack developers.

title: Mastering Node.js Applications
author: Laura Becker
description: Learn how to build scalable, high-performance backend applications using Node.js, from event loops to deployment.

title: CSS Secrets Unveiled
author: Tobias Klein
description: Unlock advanced CSS techniques to create stunning, responsive, and maintainable web designs.

title: JavaScript: From Basics to Beyond
author: Sophie Wagner
description: A complete journey through JavaScript — from variables and functions to closures, async programming, and real-world projects.

title: RESTful API Design with Express
author: Jan Hofmann
description: Design and implement clean, efficient RESTful APIs using Express.js and industry best practices.

title: Frontend Development with React
author: Julia Schmitt
description: Build interactive user interfaces and single-page applications with React, JSX, and component-based architecture.

title: TypeScript for JavaScript Developers
author: Felix Krüger
description: A beginner-friendly introduction to TypeScript and how it enhances JavaScript applications with static typing and tooling.

title: Database Essentials for Web Apps
author: Nico Frank
description: Understand relational and NoSQL databases, schema design, queries, and integration with web applications.

title: Debugging and Testing in JavaScript
author: Lisa Müller
description: Improve code reliability through effective debugging strategies, test-driven development, and modern testing frameworks.

title: Modern Web Architecture
author: Paul Schneider
description: Explore microservices, serverless deployment, and modular design patterns for future-proof web applications.

title: Security for Web Developers
author: Anna Bauer
description: Protect your apps with best practices in authentication, authorization, data validation, and secure coding.
